message.body: so andrew basically said we could/would hookup when i was in town.
Oh damn. How did that happen?
Hm. It doesn't feel that way to me.

he's just so nonchalant about it, i guess, that it feels like luke-warm-ness to me. on a related note, shan invited him and his friend that's visiting over to their house to party tonight. it makes me really happy that they're hanging out even though i sooo want to be there.
hey girl heyyyy. are you feeling less angry angry angry?
Trying to. What are you doing tomorrow night?
supposedly hanging out with my parents but depending on what you're thinking about i could get out early. :)
did you talk to him already?!
I saw him in traffic a few days ago and texted him about it. I asked if he was free this weekend to hang out, and mentioned you were in town. He seemed to like
Just think about it. If you don't wanna, I just won't invite him. It can be just me and you.
mkay. :) you da best. regardless, what time do you think?
After I get off work here. I'll have to run home and clean up. But 10ish?
perf. mom cancelled on me anyway, boo.
